pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scalar-on-Function Regression with Measurement Error Correction // Solve scalar-on-function linear models, including generalized linear mixed effect model and quantile linear regression model, and bias correction estimation methods due to measurement error. Details about the measurement error bias correction methods, see Luan et al. (2023) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2305.12624, Tekwe et al. (2022) doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxac017, Zhang et al. (2023) doi:10.5705/ss.202021.0246, Tekwe et al. (2019) doi:10.1002/sim.8179.
